last_episode_to_air.name: The Nutcracker Scoob
last_episode_to_air.overview: A scrooge named Mr. Nickelby tries to close down a children's home so he can have it for himself. Meanwhile, a ghost is also haunting the children's home, just when Fred and the gang decorate for Christmas. Could these two things have any connection? Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred.

name: The New Scooby and Scrappy-Doo Show
original_name: The New Scooby and Scrappy-Doo Show
overview: The New Scooby and Scrappy Doo Show is the sixth incarnation of the Hanna-Barbera Saturday morning cartoon Scooby-Doo. It premiered on September 10, 1983, and ran for one season on ABC as a half-hour program made up of two eleven-minute short cartoons.  The show is a return to the mystery solving format and reintroduces Daphne after a four-year absence. The plots of each episode feature her, Shaggy, Scooby-Doo, and Scrappy-Doo solving supernatural mysteries under the cover of being reporters for a teen magazine.

seasons.name: The New Scooby and Scrappy-Doo Show
seasons.overview: The New Scooby and Scrappy Doo Show is the sixth incarnation of the Hanna-Barbera Saturday morning cartoon Scooby-Doo. It premiered on September 10, 1983, and ran for one season on ABC as a half-hour program made up of two eleven-minute short cartoons. The show is a return to the mystery solving format and reintroduces Daphne after a four-year absence. The plots of each episode feature her, Shaggy, Scooby-Doo, and Scrappy-Doo solving supernatural mysteries under the cover of being reporters for a teen magazine

seasons.name: The New Scooby-Doo Mysteries
seasons.overview: Picking up where 'The New Scooby and Scappy Doo Show' left off. The main difference being that the team is now occasionally joined by Fred Jones and Velma Dinkley to solve mysteries together.

episodes.name: Scooby the Barbarian
episodes.overview: The kids are in Norway to find out what happened to Professor Buzby, the archeologist, who was studying the old viking ruins. It seems that some vikings have come back and kidnapped him, but before too long, Daphne and Scrappy are kidnapped too and Shaggy and Scooby have to save them.

episodes.name: No Sharking Zone
episodes.overview: The kids head to the island of Scareruba, to see Prince Ruba, and take pictures of the surfing festival and legendary surfer Cowabunga Carlyle. But while there, they hear of the lost treasure of Scareruba and the great white shark and seaweed monster who are protecting it.

episodes.name: Scoobygeist
episodes.overview: Daphne locks everyone into an old house for the night to prove it's not haunted. But when she finds a secret diary, everything she reads comes true for Shaggy and Scooby, including ghosts!

episodes.name: The Quagmire Quake Caper
episodes.overview: Daphne and the guys with the "help" of Dr.Grumper, the seismologist, try to solve the mystery of the strange earthquakes that are happening on the indian land, and the slimey monster that is trying to scare everyone away.

episodes.name: Hound of the Scoobyvilles
episodes.overview: The kids are headed to Barkerville Hall, in Scotland, to figure out what is happening to the Barkervilles sheep. Has the curse come true, has the Hound of the Barkervilles come, and is it Scooby, as all the town people believe.

episodes.name: The Dinosaur Deception
episodes.overview: The gang goes to visit Dr.LaRue, an archeologist, in San Pablo, Mexico, who excavated a dinosaur that has come to life. The dinosaur is now scaring everyone off, but why, and does it have anything to do with the Lost Silver Mine of Montazuma.

episodes.name: The Creature from Chem Lab
episodes.overview: The kids head to Hillside High, to help Daphne's cousin Jennifer out. It seem that a creature from the chemistry lab has been scaring off students and forced the school to cancel it's dance. Does it have something to do with Professor Marcin, who believes kids should do school work and have no fun, or someone else?

episodes.name: No Thanks, Masked Manx
episodes.overview: The gang goes to Blake Manor for a vacation, and gets there in time for the costume party, where Mr.Blake will be auctioning off a valuable stamp worth millions. But there is a cat burglar, the Masked Manx, on the loose, who leaves an ace of spades in the place of every item he steals. Can the kids stop him and save the stamp?

episodes.name: Scooby of the Jungle
episodes.overview: The kids head to the game preserve in the African jungle, to interview Mr.Rasheed and discover what is behind the disappearances of the jungle animals. With the help of Scooby's animal phrase book, the kids learn that some of the animals are being put into a trance after hearing a strange whistle.

episodes.name: Scooby-Doo and Cyclops, Too
episodes.overview: The gang is on their way to Paradise Island for a vacation, and stop at Barney's Gas Station for food. While there, Barney tells them how people who have stayed on the island have vanished, and others have been turned into zombies.

episodes.name: Scooby-Roo
episodes.overview: The gang heads into the desert, to Devils Rock, to take some pictures. But the kids soon hear of the Neanderthal who is scaring everyone away from the area, and Daphne's pictures around the rock are not turning out.

episodes.name: Scooby's Gold Medal Gambit
episodes.overview: The Chameleon, a master of disguise, escapes from Wholesome Prison, and is headed to the World Games to steal the gold medals. At the same time the kids are there to report on the games, and they try to help Chairman Lewis protect the medals and capture the bad guy.

episodes.name: Wizards and Warlocks
episodes.overview: While attending the Wizards and Warlock Convention, the kids find everyone has been trapped by the Wizard of the Tower. It is then up to Scrappy to win this life sized game of "Wizards and Warlocks" and set the conventionairs free.

episodes.name: Scoobsie
episodes.overview: When the phantom of the soaps kidnaps Victoria Sensible, star of "Genuine Hospital", Daphne and the guys come down to the set to get the inside story, and "Scoobsie" ends up becoming the next lady star on the show.

episodes.name: The Mark of Scooby
episodes.overview: The gang goes to the Old California Festival, where they see a play involving Scoobys favorite hero El Sabueso, who helps the poor. Later that night, while camping out, Scooby dreams he is El Scoobo and Scrappy is Scrappito, and they must save Senorita Daphne and Senor Shaggy from the commandante.

episodes.name: Crazy Carnival Caper
episodes.overview: The kids go back to their high school for the Central High Carnival, and run into their old science teacher Mr.McDabble, who has created a ruby lazer that can cut through the hardest metal. But before too long, the ruby ends up missing, and the kids have to find out what happened.

episodes.name: Scooby and the Minotaur
episodes.overview: The gang is in Greece, and when they check into their hotel, they hear about a Minotaur who is trying to scare away the International Treasure Hunters Club, which is searching for the Golden Fleece. Mr.Smith, the President of the Treasure Hunters Club, is not scared though, and after he finds the map of the Labrynth of Knossis, he continues his search.

episodes.name: Scooby Pinch Hits
episodes.overview: The kids attend a baseball game between the Flounders and the Roosters, to get pictures of the Flounders newest pitcher, a woman, Sally Star, and interview Coach Goober. Before long the ghost of the teams old star, Casey O'Riely, appears and kidnaps her, so Scooby steps up to the plate to help the team while Daphne and Scrappy solve the mystery.

episodes.name: The Fall Dog
episodes.overview: The kids head to Hollywood to interview Bobby Moguel about his new movie "The Amazing Wonder Car", but soon realize that he doesn't like reporters. Before they get there, the stunt guy quits the movie because a Gremlin is out to ruin it, so the gang decides to take the job to get behind the scenes.

episodes.name: The Scooby Coupe
episodes.overview: The kids head to the Annual Auto Show to interview Dr.Sprocket and his assistant Crocker Pitt, about the unveiling of the new supercharged XYZ Sports Coupe. While there, they run into his blue ribbon rival, Ingrid Ignition, and hear about the threats from the Spectre of Sports Cars, who stole the blueprints to his car.

episodes.name: Who's Minding the Monster?
episodes.overview: While in Transylvania, the kids read about Frankensteins monster returning and frightening the town. In order to solve the mystery, the group hire in as babysitters for the new residents of Frankenstein Castle, the Dracula's.

episodes.name: Scooby a la Mode
episodes.overview: The gangs in Paris for the 200th birthday of the Versailles Academy, a pastry school, to interview Madam LaTorte. But while there, they come across the ghost of Chef Maras, founder of the school, who is scaring everyone away and maybe forcing the school bankrupt.

episodes.name: Where's Scooby-Doo? (1)
episodes.overview: The kids are mysteriously sent train tickets to board the Orient Express, for a trip. But when they get their Scooby's bag is switched with another one, and when he goes in search of his bag full of Scooby Snax, he turns up missing as well. Did the mummy kidnap Scooby, or the spy who stole the fuel formula?

episodes.name: Where's Scooby-Doo? (2)
episodes.overview: The kids are mysteriously sent train tickets to board the Orient Express, for a trip. But when they get their Scooby's bag is switched with another one, and when he goes in search of his bag full of Scooby Snax, he turns up missing as well. Did the mummy kidnap Scooby, or the spy who stole the fuel formula?

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Boos! (1)
episodes.overview: The guys go home to Plymouth, Massachussetts for the wedding of Shaggy's sister Maggie to Wilfred, but when the ghost of their long dead realative McBaggy Rogers appears and wants back his old ring that is hiding a map to the family treasure, will Maggie get married without it?

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Boos! (2)
episodes.overview: The guys go home to Plymouth, Massachussetts for the wedding of Shaggy's sister Maggie to Wilfred, but when the ghost of their long dead realative McBaggy Rogers appears and wants back his old ring that is hiding a map to the family treasure, will Maggie get married without it?

1.name: The New Scooby and Scrappy-Doo Show
1.overview: The New Scooby and Scrappy Doo Show is the sixth incarnation of the Hanna-Barbera Saturday morning cartoon Scooby-Doo. It premiered on September 10, 1983, and ran for one season on ABC as a half-hour program made up of two eleven-minute short cartoons. The show is a return to the mystery solving format and reintroduces Daphne after a four-year absence. The plots of each episode feature her, Shaggy, Scooby-Doo, and Scrappy-Doo solving supernatural mysteries under the cover of being reporters for a teen magazine

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Scooby-Doo
episodes.overview: The gang is invited to a television studio in Los Angeles for Scooby's birthday, which is to be celebrated with a This is Your Life-style special. To Scooby’s happiness, he also reunites with Velma and Fred on the show, both of whom have gotten their own careers. However, a vengeful villain from Scooby’s past tries to ruin the night for him and the gang. Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred and Marla Frumkin as Velma

episodes.name: Scooby's Peep-Hole Pandemonium
episodes.overview: The gang is hired to interview the reclusive Norma Deathman, who lives with her monstrous servants. Since she is having a birthday party, the gang disguises themselves as caterers in order to gain entry to her house, but when Deathman realizes who the gang actually is, they have to run for their lives from her and her monsters.

episodes.name: The Hand of Horror
episodes.overview: When Shaggy takes a wrong turn, the gang end up at a mansion. Ratfield leaves the house after being fired and tells the gang to leave, too. They head in and find two bickering twins. Then, a mysterious, disembodied hand pesters the gang.

episodes.name: Scoo-Be or Not Scoo-Be
episodes.overview: While on a cheap European tour, the gang stays at a hotel in Denmark where a group of sea demons is haunting. Things get even weirder when the ghost of Hamlet suddenly appears.

episodes.name: The Stoney Glare Stare
episodes.overview: In Greece, Scooby, Scrappy, Shaggy and Daphne and a secret agent (taking the role of a café owner) head to find a missing professor and stop Thaddeus Blimp from turning al his enemies and the world leaders to stone.

episodes.name: Mission Un-Doo-Able
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang try to stop a mastermind criminal from taking over the world by infiltrating his secret lair at the Statue of Liberty in New York City.

episodes.name: The Bee Team
episodes.overview: The gang heads to a honey farm, where giant bees are frightening the nearby town.

episodes.name: Doom Service
episodes.overview: The Ghost of Ebenezer Overview has returned to haunt his hotel in the mountains. Can Scooby and the gang find out what is happening before the last two guests leave?

episodes.name: A Code in the Nose
episodes.overview: When a supervillain named Codefinger steals a top-secret decoding device and hides it in Pingley's Dept. store, the military recruits the gang to help them find it. They end up in a crazy situation when they talk secret code to the household appliances in the store.

episodes.name: Ghost of the Ancient Astronauts
episodes.overview: In South America, the gang joins Velma’s uncle on an expedition in the Amazon rainforest while investigating a mystery involving ancient aliens. Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred and Marla Frumkin as Velma.

episodes.name: The Night of the Living Toys
episodes.overview: The gang visits a toy store where toys are coming alive everywhere.

episodes.name: South Pole Vault
episodes.overview: The gang visits a research center in the South Pole, where a mad sea lion is terrorizing everyone.

episodes.name: A Halloween Hassle at Dracula's Castle
episodes.overview: On Halloween night, after being lured to the castle of Count Dracula, the gang must help a gaggle of real monsters take on an evil magician and a ghost before it’s too late. Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred and Marla Frumkin as Velma.

episodes.name: A Night Louse at the White House
episodes.overview: Velma invites the gang to a NASA banquet at the White House, but the ghosts of Presidents Abraham Lincoln, Teddy Roosevelt, Ulysses S. Grant and George Washington show up during the event and cause chaos. Guest stars Marla Frumkin as Velma.

episodes.name: The 'Dooby Dooby Doo' Ado
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang visit Scooby’s relative Dooby Doo in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Showboat Scooby
episodes.overview: Dixie Doo is being haunted by a Civil War ghost during a performance on her showboat, and Scooby and the gang try to help her.

episodes.name: Sherlock Doo
episodes.overview: Fred joins the gang in a mystery-solvers' contest at the home of Sherlock Holmes in London. While solving one of Sherlock Holmes’s old cases, the Ghost of Sherlock Holmes appears. But is his goal to assist the gang in solving the mystery, or frame them for a theft? Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred.

episodes.name: A Scary Duel With a Cartoon Ghoul
episodes.overview: A cartoon villain named Monster Mutt jumps out of a TV and wreaks havoc.

episodes.name: E*I*E*I*O
episodes.overview: While the gang goes on mysteries on a countryside at Old MacDonald’s E.I.E.I.O. (Experimental Institute for Evolutionary Improvement of Organisms). A genetic experiment on a field mouse making it a thirty-foot tall monster mouse and terrorize his farm.

episodes.name: The Nutcracker Scoob
episodes.overview: A scrooge named Mr. Nickelby tries to close down a children's home so he can have it for himself. Meanwhile, a ghost is also haunting the children's home, just when Fred and the gang decorate for Christmas. Could these two things have any connection? Guest stars Frank Welker as Fred.

2.name: The New Scooby-Doo Mysteries
2.overview: Picking up where 'The New Scooby and Scappy Doo Show' left off. The main difference being that the team is now occasionally joined by Fred Jones and Velma Dinkley to solve mysteries together.
